meanings.definition: Payment made before it is due.
meanings.sent1: The prepayment for the concert tickets ensured our seats.
meanings.sent2: I made a prepayment for the online order to secure the discount.
meanings.sent3: The prepayment for the pizza delivery made the delivery guy smile.
meanings.sent4: Her prepayment for the vacation rental was like planting a seed of anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The prepayment was like a golden ticket to skip the line.

meanings.definition: The act of paying for something in advance.
meanings.sent1: We appreciated the convenience of making a prepayment for the subscription.
meanings.sent2: The prepayment for the hotel room saved us time during check-in.
meanings.sent3: Making a prepayment for the car rental felt like a smart move.
meanings.sent4: His prepayment for the event tickets was a leap of faith in his schedule.
meanings.sent5: The prepayment was a proactive way to handle the upcoming expenses.
